thread.title: Gulf Shores students recovering, improving after Tuesday's Mardi Gras parade crash
thread.title_full: Gulf Shores students recovering, improving after Tuesday's Mardi Gras parade crash

author: John Sharp | jsharp@al.com
title: Gulf Shores students recovering, improving after Tuesday's Mardi Gras parade crash
text: Baldwin County Schools Superintendent Eddie Tyler said Wednesday that of the three students who remain hospitalized from injuries sustained during Tuesday's parade crash, two of them appear to be in good spirits and recovering. He visited with them on Wednesday in Pensacola.
